amendatorysection.catchline: Zoning regulations; appeal; when taken; notice; record.
amendatorysection.para: All appeals taken under section 3-314 must be taken within a reasonable time, as provided by the rules of the board, by filing with the agency from which the appeal is taken and with the board, a notice of appeal specifying the grounds thereof. The agency, from which the appeal is taken, shall forthwith transmit to the board all the papers constituting the record upon which the action appealed from was taken.
